item.title: 据说丰田计划从 MUFG 和 SMFG 战略性回购股票
item.description: 据知情人士透露，丰田汽车公司将宣布从日本主要银行和保险公司回购自己的股票，作为1万亿日元回购计划和与金融合作伙伴解除战略持股的更广泛计划的一部分。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. is set to announce the buyback of its own shares from major Japanese banks and insurers as part of a ¥1 trillion repurchase plan and a broader program to unwind strategic shareholdings with financial partners, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 新加坡核心通胀率自 2022 年以来首次降至 3% 以下
item.description: 新加坡 6 月份的核心通胀率降幅超过预期，这使得央行有余力专注于保护这个依赖贸易的经济体免受全球冲击的影响。【原文：Singapore’s core inflation decelerated more than expected in June, allowing the central bank room to focus on shielding the trade-reliant economy from global shocks.】

item.title: Visi Media 的贷款人称法官接受了 5.6 亿美元的债务索赔
item.description: PT Visi Media Asia 的一个债权人团体表示，它说服了雅加达的一名法官完全接受其 5.6 亿美元的债务索赔要求，允许其参与公司重组，并有可能收回其成员的部分欠款。【原文：A group of PT Visi Media Asia’s creditors said it convinced a judge in Jakarta to fully accept its $560 million debt claims, allowing it to participate in the company’s restructuring and potentially recover some of what its members are owed.】

item.title: 经济复苏加快，越南信贷增长加速
item.description: 随着经济复苏加速，越南 2024 年上半年的信贷扩张几乎比一年前翻了一番，但仍远低于央行的目标。【原文：Vietnam’s credit expansion in the first half of 2024 almost doubled from a year ago as economic recovery accelerates, although still way below the central bank’s goal.】

item.title: 印度预算案包括安抚莫迪盟友的计划，并将重点放在就业上
item.description: 在印度新联合政府执政后的首份预算案中，莫迪预计将坚持抑制财政赤字的计划，同时仍将减税和增加福利支出，以让盟友满意。【原文：In India’s first budget under a new coalition government, Modi is expected to stick to a plan of curbing the fiscal deficit, while still cutting taxes and boosting welfare spending to keep his allies happy.】

item.title: Ozempic 制造商诺和诺德启动另一个大型建筑项目
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）已获得土地和规划许可，这可能是该公司在丹麦的下一个主要厂址，因为这家拥有 100 年历史的公司正努力满足对其减肥药不断飙升的需求。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S has secured land and planning permissions for what may be its next major factory site in Denmark as the 100-year-old company works to meet soaring demand for its weight loss drugs.】

item.title: 菲律宾地产股在在线赌场禁令余波中暴跌
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）下令禁止针对中国赌客的在线赌场，这引发了周二地产股的暴跌，因为关闭赌场可能导致许多办公场所空置。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr.’s order to ban online casinos targeting Chinese bettors triggered a slump in property stocks on Tuesday, as the shutdown could render many office spaces vacant.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老基金 CFS 将扩大基础设施资产规模
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老金和财富管理公司之一第一州殖民公司（Colonial First State）计划增加其私人基础设施的持股量，以抵御市场波动和通货膨胀的影响。【原文：Colonial First State, one of Australia’s biggest pension and wealth managers, plans to boost its private infrastructure holdings as a shelter from volatile markets and sticky inflation.】

item.title: 莫迪股票 "在预算案公布前面临投资者的警惕

item.description: 中国中央政府终于想出了解决地区财政危机的办法，而这在很大程度上取决于地方政府释放消费支出的能力。【原文：China’s central government is finally devising a fix for a regional fiscal crisis that will hinge largely on the ability of local authorities to unleash consumer spending.】

item.title: 伍德赛德希望在收购的美国工厂打造 "液化天然气梦之队
item.description: 伍德赛德能源集团有限公司（Woodside Energy Group Ltd.）正在为其刚刚购买的美国液化天然气项目寻找合作伙伴，以期最终启动这一陷入困境的开发项目。【原文：Woodside Energy Group Ltd. is searching for partners for its just-purchased US liquefied natural gas project in a bid to finally launch the troubled development.】

item.title: 美世首席信息官称，激烈的美国大选提升了美联储按兵不动的可能性
item.description: 美世有限责任公司（Mercer LLC）首席投资官表示，美联储有越来越大的可能在年底前维持利率不变，而不是卷入日趋激烈的美国大选角逐。【原文：There’s a growing chance the Federal Reserve could stand pat on interest rates until year-end rather than enter the fray of an increasingly heated US election race, according to Mercer LLC’s chief investment officer.】

item.title: 美国大选出现转折，新兴市场交易员寻求重仓资产避险
item.description: 今年，从印度到南非和墨西哥的选举都出人意料，美国政坛的最新转折正促使新兴市场投资者兜售发展中世界一些最受打击的资产。【原文：In a year marked by electoral surprises from India to South Africa and Mexico, the latest twist — now in US politics — is prompting emerging-market investors to tout some of the most battered assets in the developing world.】

item.title: 印度银行短期债务因贷款需求升至 12 年新高
item.description: 印度银行越来越多地转向期限较短的借款，以弥补贷款强劲增长和存款减少造成的资金短缺。【原文：Indian banks are increasingly turning to shorter-maturity borrowing to bridge a funding shortfall caused by robust loan growth and dwindling deposits.】

item.title: Grab 收购新加坡餐饮预订公司 Chope：英国电信
item.description: 据《商业时报》周一报道，Grab 控股有限公司收购了餐厅预订平台 Chope，收购金额未披露，并将接管其在新加坡、印度尼西亚和泰国的业务。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. has acquired restaurant reservation platform Chope for an undisclosed sum and will take over its operations in Singapore, Indonesia and Thailand, The Business Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 阿美风险投资支持韩国人工智能芯片制造商反叛者公司

item.title: 中国 LGFV 在再融资热潮中创下美元债券销售纪录
item.description: 被视为中国债务市场最大风险之一的中国地方政府融资工具在美元债券市场上找到了一些喘息机会，因为政府缓解还款压力的努力增强了投资者的信心。【原文：China’s local government financing vehicles, seen as one of the biggest risks in the nation’s debt markets, are finding some respite in the dollar bond market as government efforts to ease repayment pressures bolster investor confidence.】

item.title: 象征中国信贷泡沫破灭的香港塔
item.description: 2017 年香港出售中心摩天大楼时，创纪录的 52 亿美元标价让投资者不得不组成财团，以获得多数股权并分割楼层。这一决定正迅速成为一块磨刀石。【原文：When The Center skyscraper was sold in Hong Kong in 2017, the record $5.2 billion price tag was so high that investors had to form a consortium to take a majority stake and divvy up the floors. That decision is rapidly becoming a millstone.】

item.title: 南非改革促使货币基金经理 Abax 提高风险敞口
item.description: 资产管理公司 Abax Investments Ltd. 受总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）经济改革计划的鼓舞，增加了对南非股票的投资。【原文：Asset manager Abax Investments Ltd. has increased exposure to South African equities, encouraged by President Cyril Ramaphosa’s economic-reform plans, but warned that investors would want to see results before getting too excited.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会将批准以太币现货 ETF，这是加密货币发展的最新里程碑
item.description: 美国监管机构批准了首批直接投资于全球第二大加密货币以太币的交易所交易基金，这是对价值 2.4 万亿美元的数字资产行业的最新推动。【原文：US regulators were seen approving the first exchange-traded funds that invest directly in Ether, the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency, in the latest boost to the $2.4 trillion digital-asset industry.】

item.title: Golub 牵头为 TA 分割业务提供 10 亿美元私人信贷交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Golub Capital 主导了约 10 亿美元的私人债务融资，以支持 TA Associates 收购从 Community Brands 分拆出来的 Momentive Software。【原文：Golub Capital led a roughly $1 billion private debt facility to support TA Associates acquisition of Momentive Software, a carveout from Community Brands, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 佩尔茨的特里安集团建立 3M 分拆公司 Solventum 的股份制
item.description: 激进投资者纳尔逊-佩尔茨（Nelson Peltz）的特里安基金管理公司（Trian Fund Management）已在 3M 公司的医疗保健衍生公司 Solventum Corp.【原文：Activist investor Nelson Peltz’s Trian Fund Management has amassed a stake in 3M Co.’s health-care spinoff Solventum Corp.】
